overview: During the 1997 war in Congo DRC former Zaire, Francine, a 12-year-old Congolese girl, was recruited by the Rwandan army and its Ugandan ally, led by Laurent Kabila to oust MOBUTU from power. 20 years later, the Francine's mum comes to visit her. She tells her her story.
title: 20 years later
